text:
Words to see by...I chose to get a #COVID19 #vaccine b/c it helps minimize the risk of the virus for me as well as others. When I wear a mask, I do it for the benefit of myself as well as you. There are #children at high risk & too young to be vaccinated. 💔😷
#GetVaccinatedNow💉 https://t.co/p9tAkIwTCp https://t.co/1rQv5r1dZm
